attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea that humans have the right to hunt animals for sport or for fun is totally baseless, no other animal in the world does it, why should we be allowed to? Please outlaw all recreational hunting and set an example to all countries that killing animals for fun is wrong and we may just be able to help the beautiful endangered animals like tigers and elephants which are the worst victims of hunting.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
